definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

pinyin: xian1 mao2 dong4 li4 dan4 bai2

sentences.english: In the nose, cilia help to drain mucus from the nasal cavity down to the throat.
sentences.chinese: 比方说鼻子，纤毛可以帮助粘液从鼻腔流到喉咙。

sentences.english: Maintenance of humidity is vital for ciliary function .
sentences.chinese: 保持湿度对纤毛功能来说十分重要。

sentences.english: Each cilium terminates within the Pavilion - with another tiny light source.
sentences.chinese: 每个纤毛终亭与另一极光源。

sentences.english: Each comb plate is a simple rectangular paddle composed of cilia.
sentences.chinese: 每个栉板都是纤毛组成的矩形的桨。

sentences.english: Microtubules are also used in the construction of centrioles, basal bodies, cilia and flagella.
sentences.chinese: 微管还用于建造中心粒，基体，纤毛和鞭毛。

sentences.english: This coughing may last as long as a couple of months, until the cilia are fully recovered.
sentences.chinese: 这种咳嗽可能会持续几个月，直到纤毛完全修复。

sentences.english: Blepharisma is thought to be a relatively primitive genus in the phylum Ciliophora.
sentences.chinese: 赭纤虫被认为是一类进化过程中较为原始的纤毛虫。

sentences.english: The stomach mucosal epithelium consists of ciliated cells and microvilli.
sentences.chinese: 胃粘膜上皮由纤毛细胞和微绒毛细胞组成。

sentences.english: An inner mucous membrane has cilia (see cilium) that project inward to trap particles.
sentences.chinese: 内层的黏膜有纤毛，向内突出以挡住微粒。

sentences.english: He sees the roots falling away from her human body.
sentences.chinese: 他看见纤毛从她的人类身体上脱落。

sentences.english: Connecting cilium and accessory outer segment are present in both rods and cones.
sentences.chinese: 视锥和视杆均含有连接纤毛和辅助外段。

sentences.english: Most of the epithelia are ciliated columnar cells.
sentences.chinese: 粘膜上皮主要为单层柱状纤毛细胞。

sentences.english: Pseudostratified ciliated columnar epithelium from the trachea.
sentences.chinese: 气管表面的假复层纤毛柱状上皮。

sentences.english: Objective To study the structural characteristic of cilium of photoreceptor cells from neonatal retina.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解新出生期视网膜感光细胞纤毛结构特点。

sentences.english: The unit membrane of the cell continues up over each cilium .
sentences.chinese: 细胞膜向上突起延续构成纤毛的表面。

sentences.english: The airways are lined with tiny hairs known as cilia.
sentences.chinese: 在呼吸道的表面布满了微小的毛发，称为为纤毛。
